application.title: Complete Your Application
application.subtitle: Fill out all sections below to submit your application
application.steps: Complete your application in 4 easy steps

placeholders.skillInput: Add a skill (e.g., Patient Care, IV Therapy)
placeholders.additionalInfo: Tell us anything else you'd like us to know...

documents.resumeDescription: Upload your most recent resume (PDF, DOC, or DOCX)
documents.coverLetterDescription: Optional: Upload a personalized cover letter
documents.portfolioDescription: Optional: Upload your portfolio or work samples
documents.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to browse
documents.fileTypeError: File type must be one of: .pdf, .doc, .docx

messages.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields (marked with *) and upload your resume to submit your application.
messages.secureSubmission: Your application will be submitted securely and you'll receive a confirmation email.
messages.error: Failed to submit application. Please try again.
